snippet: Two executives of the Pakistani arm of computer giant Hewlett-Packard Co were arrested by local officials in Karachi on Friday on suspicion of corporate tax evasion, the Wall Street Journal reported....

headline.print_headline: HP Executives Held in Pakistan Tax Probe: WSJ
headline.main: HP Executives Held in Pakistan Tax Probe: WSJ

lead_paragraph: Two executives of the Pakistani arm of computer giant Hewlett-Packard Co were arrested by local officials in Karachi on Friday on suspicion of corporate tax evasion, the Wall Street Journal reported.
